message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire this exceptional product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm confident you'll find it valuable. I'm willing to start with a price of $1400000.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Alice, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. I believe it's a fair price considering the market value of similar products.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but I have to consider my own valuation of the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to lower the price to $1350000. I believe this is a fair compromise, considering the value you've placed on similar products.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking of $1300000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, and I'm glad we're getting closer to a mutually beneficial agreement. However, I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking of $1325000. This is the best I can do, considering my valuation of the product.

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above $1200000. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking of $1300000. However, I'm also willing to throw in an additional $10000 to sweeten the deal, making it $1290000. I believe this is a fair price for both of us.

Bob, I appreciate the added incentive, but I still need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, but I'm not willing to go below $1320000. I'm thinking of $1320000 as a compromise. I believe this is a fair price considering the value you've placed on similar products.

I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not willing to go above $1200000. I'm willing to make one more concession and meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'm thinking of $1290000. I believe this is the maximum I can reasonably pay for the product.
